MWC.GUI

Interface StepperListener.StepperController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AWTStepControl, StepControl, SwingStepControl
    Enclosing interface:
    StepperListener

    public static interface StepperListener.StepperController
    embedded interface for an actual stepper controller (such as the Debrief Step Control)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      add a new listener
      void doStep(boolean forward, boolean large_step)
      instruct the stepper to move forwards, backwards
      HiResDate getCurrentTime()
      find out what the current time is
      HiResDate getTimeZero()
      determine the zero-time or anchor for the current dataset

      remove a listener
